title: Watch: NBC news crew runs to shelter in Israel
description: NBC News' Raf Sanchez and his crew run to a shelter as they hear booms while reporting in Sderot, Israel.

title: Palestinian representative to the UN: 'We are not subhumans'
description: Riyad Mansour, the Palestinian representative to the United Nations, addressed Israel's response to the Hamas attacks and criticized the international community by claiming "nothing is done when those killed are Palestinians."

title: Watch: Israeli forces open fire on Hamas militants on highway
description: Witness video shows Israeli forces opening fire on Hamas militants on a highway in the Israeli coastal city of Ashkelon as motorists take cover.

title: Music festival revelers in the Israeli desert were massacred by Hamas militants
description: As thousands of people danced at a music festival in an Israeli desert area in the early hours of Saturday, Hamas militants from Gaza descended upon the revelry.

title: Carolina Panthers guard Chandler Zavala taken to hospital after suffering a neck injury
description: Carolina Panthers guard Chandler Zavala was taken to a hospital after being carted off the field with a neck injury late in the first quarter against the Detroit Lions on Sunday.

title: U.S. plans to move ships and planes closer to Israel
description: The U.S. military is planning to move U.S. Navy ships and U.S. military aircraft closer to Israel as a show of support, said two U.S. officials.

title: One person was killed and five others wounded at a shooting at a Pennsylvania community center
description: WHITE TOWNSHIP, Pa. — One person was killed and five were wounded in a shooting during a private party at a Pennsylvania community center early Sunday, police said.

title: Interim Speaker McHenry effectively powerless on Israel matters, experts say
description: The global crisis unfolding in Israel is putting renewed scrutiny on Congress, which has been without a permanent House speaker since Kevin McCarthy was ousted last week.

title: Full Haley: Israel is the 'frontline of defense' for America
description: Fmr. U.N. Ambassador and GOP presidential candidate Nikki Haley blames Iran for the attack on Israel, says she's concerned about an attack on America and says Republicans need to unite amid a vacant speakership.

title: Full Gaetz: ‘Absolutely’ worth potentially losing job to oust McCarthy
description: Rep. Matt Gaetz (R-Fla.) exclusively joins Meet the Press to discuss his lead in the ousting of former Speaker McCarthy (R-Calif.) and what it means for the House of Representatives.

title: Antony Blinken says U.S. verifying reports Americans among the dead in Israel and held hostage in Gaza
description: "We have reports that several Americans may be among the dead. We are very actively working to verify those reports," the U.S. secretary of state said on "Meet the Press."

title: Hundreds killed in Israel after Hamas launches attacks
description: At least 250 Israelis have been killed and 1,900 injured after the terrorist group Hamas launched attacks against Israel over the weekend. President Joe Biden voiced his support for Israel and warned enemies not to escalate. NBC’s Raf Sanchez reports for Sunday TODAY.

title: Largest Hindu temple outside of Asia opens in New Jersey, built by 12,500 volunteers
description: The largest Hindu temple outside of Asia has opened this weekend in New Jersey, built by 12,500 volunteers. The massive structure prompted a lawsuit and has brought up questions about the line between religious service and labor exploitation.

title: Savings simulator: Is your money beating inflation?
description: Many accounts are paying higher returns, but inflation has still taken a bite out of investors' money. Use our tool to compare the best ways to close the gap.

title: People who’ve had Covid at least 5 times describe how the illness changed with each reinfection
description: Five people who've gotten Covid at least five times describe their experiences. Several, but not all, said later infections were less severe than the first.

title: Israel reels from shock Hamas attack and warns of a long, difficult war
description: Israel was in a state of shock and a state of war Sunday after an unprecedented attack that saw Hamas fighters rampage through the country's south, killing hundreds and seizing hostages in a surprise breakout from Gaza.

title: Israeli military video shows 'strikes on Hamas military targets' inside the Gaza Strip
description: The Israeli military released footage of what it described were strikes on Hamas targets in the Gaza Strip, after Hamas militants fired thousands of rockets and sent dozens of fighters into Israeli towns near the Gaza Strip in an unprecedented attack on Saturday.

title: Biden's support of labor has imperiled support from the business world
description: Joe Biden’s tight alliance with organized labor has unnerved some of his business supporters, making it tough to rally support for his re-election bid.

title: 2 shot at Bowie State University in Maryland during homecoming weekend
description: Two people were wounded in a shooting on the campus of Bowie State University in Maryland Saturday night, officials said.

title: Watch: Building collapses in Gaza after being struck by Israeli airstrike
description: Video captured the moment when a building in Gaza collapsed after being hit by an Israeli airstrike amidst Israel's conflict with Hamas.

title: Powerball jackpot increases to $1.55 billion after no one wins
description: Powerball's massive jackpot will rollover and increase after Saturday's drawing produced no winning tickets, according to the game's website.
